scripts.deploy: npx dotenv -e .env.prod -- bash -c 'aws ecs update-service --cluster $PROD_CLUSTER_ARN --service rest-api-prod --force-new-deployment'
scripts.deploy:status: aws ecs describe-services --cluster $(npx dotenv -e .env.prod -p PROD_CLUSTER_ARN) --services rest-api-prod | jq '.services[0].events[0].message'
